Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <MYNAME>, I'm glad I ran into you!
There's something I want to give you.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I bought some at a bargain price in the
neighboring town. Look, it's a
<GREEN>fish trap</GREEN>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
With this, you can catch fish at
<BLUE>fishing points</BLUE>.
Many kinds of fish! Give it a try!
<PAGE>
Would you like me to give you a quick
explanation of how to use it?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, I'll explain then.
Come with me, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Here's where you can set a fish trap.
You can tell by the <RED>branch sticking
out of the water</RED>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
While holding the fish trap at a fishing
point, press the <BLUE>A Button</BLUE> to set
the trap in the water.
<PAGE>
Then wait for a fish to get trapped.
When a fish is caught in the trap, the
trap will start to shake.
<PAGE>
To take the trapped fish out of the
trap, press the <BLUE>A Button</BLUE> at
the fishing point.
<PAGE>
Isn't that easy? Depending what fish
you catch, you can cook them in recipes.
So be sure to try it for yourself!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
But the fish traps are fragile.
When they break, you have to use a new
one.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'll take my leave now!
Good luck, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Okay, then I will take my leave.
Good luck, <MYNAME>.
